free_text.Learning outcomes: This course first presents the underlying optical principles for microscopy including image theory as well as advanced optical imaging theory. An essential part of this lecturing will be application problems, microscope set-up as well as application oriented problems and solution including biomicroscopy and fluorescence microscopy. Advanced concepts as life time imaging, FCS and FRET will conclude this lecturing. Depending on the number of participants and availability of microscopes we will try to organize a hands-on session for microscopy.
